heroes.name: Vindicta
heroes.fullDescription: Vindicta has the mobility to engage at her leisure, picking at her prey and bleeding them out slowly. Injured enemies at any distance should fear being picked when she is on the map.

heroes.name: Yamato
heroes.fullDescription: Yamato uses precise strikes to decimate her rivals. However, such damaging attacks often will leave her exposed, so she needs to make every shot count.

heroes.name: Abrams
heroes.fullDescription: Abrams has the bulk and sustain to lead from the front, often running into the middle of his foes and watching them scatter. If his enemies waste their fire on him, his back-line teammates can lay out the damage with impunity.

heroes.name: Bebop
heroes.quickDescription: Hooks an enemy for a knockout combo
heroes.fullDescription: Bebop can string together his abilities in many different ways. Disrupting enemy postions, saving an all or dealing bursts of damage. When the situation doesn't require sublety his giant laser still solves many problems.

heroes.name: Dynamo
heroes.fullDescription: Dynamo keeps himself and his allies healthy while waiting for his moment. Few things can warp a team fight more than a well-coordinated use of Singularity.

heroes.name: Grey Talon
heroes.fullDescription: A cunning predator, Grey Talon uses a combination of deadly accuracy, traps, and clever positioning to bring down the toughest of opponets.

heroes.name: Haze
heroes.fullDescription: When Haze fixates on a target she can hold her own in a firefight. She prefers to create one sided exchanges, avoiding damage then picking off unsuspecting targets up close.

heroes.name: Infernus
heroes.quickDescription: Lights up enemies and watches them burn
heroes.fullDescription: Infernus has many ways to deal damage over time, burning foes before swooping in for the kill. Due to Infernus's blazing speed, his enemies won't be able to escape the flames.

heroes.name: Ivy
heroes.quickDescription: Sets up a power duo with a lucky ally
heroes.fullDescription: Ivy has disruptive combat tricks that slow and stun enemies. She's most effective when linking up with an ally, empowering her and her ally's gun as well as sharing heals.

heroes.name: Kelvin
heroes.fullDescription: Timely heals and splitting a teamfight properly is the difference between an easy victory or a ruinous defeat. Gliding around slowing enmies gives Kelvi's team the maneuvering advantage to make this happen.

heroes.name: Lady Geist
heroes.quickDescription: Sacrifices health then drains it back
heroes.fullDescription: Expending health to achieve devestating effects is the source of Lady Geist's power. When running low, she can drain the life out of her rivals.

heroes.name: Lash
heroes.quickDescription: Dives down to stomp his foes
heroes.fullDescription: Lash gives his enemies little room to breathe. Either by flyingin from long distance to initiate combat with unsuspecting enemies, or pursuing said enemies when they try to run.

heroes.name: McGinnis
heroes.quickDescription: Controls the battle with combat turrets
heroes.fullDescription: Precise placement is everything for McGinnis, whether she's creating a killzone or splitting the enemy team. She can help keep her team runnign making them hard to dislodge when entranched.

heroes.name: Mo And Krill
heroes.fullDescription: By burrowing through the ground, Mo and Krill can get the drop on almot anyone; and once they get in close the results can be devastating.

heroes.name: Paradox
heroes.fullDescription: Manipulating time lets Paradox outpace an enemy in once on one combat. She thrives by subjecting her enemies to timely swaps into a waiting pulse grenade, her wall, or into the middle of her teammates.

heroes.name: Pocket
heroes.fullDescription: With a powerful shotgun and thin frame, Pocket relies on their ability to briefly escape into a mystic suitcase and teleport via a flying cloak in order to survive close encounters.

heroes.name: Seven
heroes.fullDescription: Seven thrives in a skirmish waiting for the time to strike. Then he rolls into the fight like a storm and batters his enemies with a cascade of lightning.

heroes.name: Shiv
heroes.quickDescription: Bleeds out foes, then goes in for the kill
heroes.fullDescription: Shiv has zero interest in playing fair, whihc is why he relies on hit and run tactics to weaken enemies before he dives in for the kill.

heroes.name: Viscous
heroes.fullDescription: Viscous vexes his opponents through clever evasion and strategic uses of healing, enabling him to withstand the most brutal enemey attacks.

heroes.name: Warden
heroes.quickDescription: Weakens his enemies and chases them down
heroes.fullDescription: Warden leads from the front, jumping into the fray and hindering his opponents' ability to fight effectively. But what Warden considers brave, others consider reckless, and if he's not careful he can easily find the himself in over his head.

heroes.name: Wraith
heroes.fullDescription: Excelling at one-on-one combat, Wraith isolates targets, eliminating them with ruthless efficiency, then teleporting away before anyone can retaliate.

heroes.name: Mirage
heroes.quickDescription: Times his shots and catches fleeing targets
heroes.fullDescription: Mirage can envelop himself in a violent tornado to catch up to enemies and lift them up. His scarabs help him sustain against multiple enemies, and he's always ready to help an ally or punish an enemy anywhere.

heroes.name: Calico
heroes.fullDescription: Calico uses the shadows to her advantage, weaving in and out of combat to hunt down her enemies one by one.

heroes.name: Holliday
heroes.fullDescription: Holliday depends on her skills as a crach shot, shooting things she's bounced into the air. WIth good aim she can lay out heavy damage. Her movement skills let her isolate her enemies or beat a hasty retreat.

heroes.name: Sinclair
heroes.fullDescription: With the help of their unwilling assistant, THE MAGNIFICENT SINCLAIR can confuse enemies with curving hexes and rapid bolts.

heroes.name: Vyper
heroes.fullDescription: With a powerful weapon (and deadly venom to match), Vyper can slither into the back of teams and assassinate high-priority targets in a storm of bullets.

heroAbilities.name: Stake
heroAbilities.description: Throw a stake that tethers enemies to the location where the stake lands. Enemy movement is restricted to the length of the tether.

heroAbilities.name: Flight
heroAbilities.description: Leap into the air and fly. While in flight your weapon deals bonus spirit damage

heroAbilities.name: Crow Familiar
heroAbilities.description: Your crow familiar deals impact damage and applies bleed that deals damage based on the target's current health.

powerUp.description: Crow Richochets up to 2 times towards enemies within 15m

heroAbilities.name: Assassinate
heroAbilities.description: Use your scoped rifle to fire a powerful shot over long distances. Deal only partial damage until fully charged after 1s of being scoped. Does bonus damage to enemies with less than 50% health remianing. Landing a killing blow on a player with Assassniate gratns you bonus souls.

boxstats.description: 1s Full Charge Time, 50% No Charge Damage, +20% Headshot Damage

heroAbilities.name: Power Slash
heroAbilities.description: Channel to increase damage over 1.4 seconds, then release a fully-charged sword strike. Press [1] or [LMC] to trigger the strike early, dealing partial damage.

powerUp.description: -2s Ability Cooldown and Apply 40% movement slow for 3 seconds

heroAbilities.name: Flying Strike
heroAbilities.description: Throw a grappling hook to reel yourself towards an enemy, damaging and slowing the target when you arrive.

powerUp.description: Can Grapple to ally Heroes and +6 Weapon Damage for 10s after striking the target

heroAbilities.name: Crimson Slash
heroAbilities.description: Slash enemies in front of you, damaging them and slowing their fire rate. If any enemy heroes are hit, you heal.

powerUp.description: +10% of Max Health heal on hero hit

heroAbilities.name: Shadow Transformation
heroAbilities.description: Become infused with Yamato's shadow soul. After an initial invicible transformation, your abilites are refreshed and are 60% faster and you gain damage resists and immunity to negative status effects. When you get a hero kill, you heal and extend the duration.

boxstats.description: +40% Spirit Resist, +40% Bullet Resist and +2 seconds time on kill

powerUp.description: +3s Duration and +20 Bullet and Spirit Resist

heroAbilities.name: Siphon Life
heroAbilities.description: Drain health from enemies in front of you while they are in the radius.

heroAbilities.name: Shoulder Charge
heroAbilities.description: Charge forward, colliding with enemies and dragging them along. Hitting a wall will Stun enemies caught by Abrams. Speed increased after colliding with enemy Heroes.

powerUp.description: On Hero Collide: +25% Weapon Damage for 8s
+0.2s Stun Duration and 40% Movement Slow for 4s

heroAbilities.name: Infernal Resilience
heroAbilities.description: Regenerate a portion of incoming damage over time.

heroAbilities.name: Seismic Impact
heroAbilities.description: Leap high into the air and choose a ground location to crash into. When you hit the ground, all enemies in the radius are damaged and stunned. Press[Fire] to crash down early.

powerUp.description: Gain 100 Max Hp and 15% Fire Rate per hero hit. Lasts 25s.
On cast, become Immune to Stun, Silence, Sleep, Root, and Disarm. Expires 3s after lading.

heroAbilities.name: Exploding Uppercut
heroAbilities.description: Deal Light Melee damage to nearby units and send them flying back, causing area damage and fire rate slow where they land. Does not damage allies.

powerUp.description: On Uppercut enemy Hero, gain fast spin-up time, 2x range, and +50% Weapon damage for 12s.
On Uppercut enemy Hero, set Hook Cooldown to 0 and instantly +100% bullets to your current clip.

heroAbilities.name: Sticky Bomb
heroAbilities.description: Attach a Sticky Bomb to a nearby target that deals explosive damage after a short fuse time. Gain 1.5% damage for every enemy hero hurt. Gain +4% bomb damage for every enemy hero killed within 12 seconds of taking Bomb Damage. You can cast Sticky Bomb on yourself using [M3].

powerUp.description: On Attach, target deals 30% less damage for 5 seconds.

heroAbilities.name: Hook
heroAbilities.description: Launch out a hook that grabs and reels in the first enemy or friendly hero it hits, dealing damage if the target is an enemy. Target will placed where you are facing.

powerUp.description: Bebop deals 25% more weapon damage to hooked enemies for 10s.

heroAbilities.name: Hyper Beam
heroAbilities.description: Charge up your laster to unleash a powerful torrent of energy that deals damage and slows enemies' movement and dashes. You have slow movement and turn rate for the duration. If activated in the air, you will hover while unleashing the beam.

powerUp.description: Hyper Beam heals Bebop for 80% of its damage on Heroes; 25% on non-heroes

heroAbilities.name: Kinetic Pulse
heroAbilities.description: Release an energy pulse that knocks enemies into the air.

powerUp.description: Hit enemies are fire rate and movement slowed for 40% for 4s.
Dynamo deals 30% more Weapon Damage to hit enemies for 8s

heroAbilities.name: Quantum Entanglement
heroAbilities.description: Dynamo briefly dissapears into the void and then reappears a short distance away. On reappearing, your weapon is reloaded and has a fire rate bonus for the next clip. Can be cast with [M3] to also bring nearby allies and give them half fire rate bonus.

powerUp.description: -5s Cooldown and on reappearing, +120% base ammo

heroAbilities.name: Rejuvenating Aurora
heroAbilities.description: While channeling, restore health over time to you and any allies nearby.

powerUp.description: Gain +4m/s movespeed for 8s if Aurora is fully channeled. Gain instantly with 5AP Upgrade.
Full move and ability use and additionally heals +3.4% of Max Health per second

heroAbilities.name: Singularity
heroAbilities.description: Create a singularity in your hands that pulls in nearby enemies and damages them.

powerUp.description: Singularity takes 4% of the enemies' max health each second

heroAbilities.name: Charged Shot
heroAbilities.description: Charge up a powerful shot that pierces through enemies. Hold [1] or [Fire] to hold the shot.

powerUp.description: Improved damage scaling and -3s Charge Delay

heroAbilities.name: Rain of Arrows
heroAbilities.description: Launches you high in the air, allowing you glide slowly. While airborne, you gain Weapon Damage and multishot on your weapon. Press [jump] to cancel the glide.

powerUp.description: While airborne, +7 Weapon Damage and weapon damage applies 40% movement slow for 1.5s
While airborne, +40% Bullet lifesteal and 40% Spirit Lifesteal

heroAbilities.name: Spirit Snare
heroAbilities.description: Throw out a trap that begins to arm itself. Once armed, the trap will trigger when an enemy enters its radius, applying Movement Slow and Curse that Interupts, Silences, Disarms, and prevents item usage. Hit the trap with a Charged Shot to detonate early with increased radius.

boxstats.description: 30% Movement Slow, 2s Arm time and +30% Charged Shot Damage.

powerUp.description: Grey Talon deals +30% more Bullet Damage to enemies hit by Spirit Snare for 10s

heroAbilities.name: Guided Owl
heroAbilities.description: After 1.5s cast time, launch a spirit owl that you control and which explodes on impact, damaging and stunning enemies. Hold [Fire] to accelerate the owl. Press [Jump] to release control. Gain permanent Spirit Power for each enemy hero killed with Guided Owl.

powerUp.description: After hit, kills enemies that are below 22% Health

heroAbilities.name: Sleep Dagger
heroAbilities.description: Throw a dagger that damages and sleeps the target. Sleeping targets wake up shortly after being damaged. Throwing a Dagger does not break your invisibility. Sleep Dagger does not interrupt enemies' channeling abilities.

boxstats.description: 0.2s Min Sleep Time and 3s Sleep Duration with a target movespeed of 2m/s

powerUp.description: Applies -12% Bullet Resist and 40% Fire Rate Slow for 6s on wake-up.

heroAbilities.name: Smoke Bomb
heroAbilities.description: Fade out of sight, becoming Invisible and gaining sprint speed. Attacking removes inviisbilty. Close enemies can see through your invisibilty.

boxstats.description: 18m Spot Radius and +2m/s Invis Sprint Speed

powerUp.description: Enable and Grant +1 Ability Charges and Phase Out of the world for 0.5s

heroAbilities.name: Fixation
heroAbilities.description: Shooting a target increases your bullet damage on that target. Gain one stack per bullet hit, two if the hit is a headshot.

powerUp.description: 60 Spirit damage and 15% slow for 2s to target every 20 stacks.

heroAbilities.name: Bullet Dance
heroAbilities.description: Enter a flurry, firing your weapon at nearby enemies with perfect accuracy and added Bullet Damage

powerUp.description: +60% Bullet Evasion and 3m/s Dance Move Speed

heroAbilities.name: Catalyst
heroAbilities.description: Spew napalm that slows enemy movement and amplifies the damage infernus does to them.

heroAbilities.name: Flame Dash
heroAbilities.description: Move forward at high speed and leave a flame trail that burns enemies. Hold [fire] to dash faster.

boxstats.description: 3s Dash Time, 12m/s Dash Speed, 4s Trail Duration and 4.5m Trail Width

heroAbilities.name: Afterburn
heroAbilities.description: Your bullets build up to apply a burning effect on enemies. Infernus's bullets and abilites will refresh the duration.

boxstats.description: 9% Buildup Per Bullet, 14% Headshot Buildup and 15s Buildup Decay Time

heroAbilities.name: Concussive Combustion
heroAbilities.description: Turns you into a living bomb that explodes after a short delay, stunning all enemies in its radius.

powerUp.description: +115 Damage and +85% lifesteal from enemy heroes hit

heroAbilities.name: Kudzu Bomb
heroAbilities.description: Summon a patch of choking vines that damages and slows enemies in its radius.

heroAbilities.name: Watcher's Covenant
heroAbilities.description: Gain bonuses and automatically connect with a nearby ally to share them. Healing is replicated among all those connected. Connection requires line of sight. Press [2] to lock on to a target.

heroAbilities.name: Stone Form
heroAbilities.description: Turn yourself into impervious stone and smash into the ground, stunning and damaging enemies nearby. Heals you for a percentage of your max health. You have some air control before falling.

heroAbilities.name: Air Drop
heroAbilities.description: Take flight with an Ally or a bomb. Ally gains bullet resist but cannot attack and deal 50% damage. Drop you ally or bomb to cause a large explosion that causes movement slow. Ivy and ally gain bullet shield while flying. Air Drop has a faster cast time when targetting an ally. [LeftClick] to accelerate flying speed and [RightClick] to drop ally/bomb

boxstats.description: 12m Explode Radius and 30% Movement Slow with 3s Duration

powerUp.description: -20% Bullet Resist on enemies hit for 8s
Applies Silence on enemies hit for 3s

heroAbilities.name: Frost Grenade
heroAbilities.description: Throw a grenade that explodes in a cloud of freezing ice, damaging and slowing enemies.

powerUp.description: Frost Grenade now heals 100 HP to friendly targets. Scales with Spirit.

heroAbilities.name: Ice Path
heroAbilities.description: Kelvin creates a floating trail of ice and snow that gives movement bonus to him and his allies. Kelvin gains 60% slow resistance for the duration. Enemies can also walk on the floating trail. Press [Left Shift]/[Left CTRL] to travel up or down while in the Ice Path.

powerUp.description: While active, gain +1 Spirit Power per meter of Ice Path trail created. Max of 55 Spirit Power.

heroAbilities.name: Arctic Beam
heroAbilities.description: Shoot freezing cold energy out in front of you, damaging targets and building up movement and fire rate slow against them the longer you sustain the beam on them. You have reduced movement speed while using Arctic Beam.

boxstats.description: 25m Beam Length and 2s Slow Linger Duration

powerUp.description: Fires 2 additional Arctic Beams towards enemies within 13m of the last target hit.

heroAbilities.name: Frozen Shelter
heroAbilities.description: Kelvin freezes the air around him creating an Impenetrable dome around himself. While in the dome, allies rapidly regenerate health and ememies are slowed.

powerUp.description: +60 Health Regen and now scales with Spirit Power.

heroAbilities.name: Essence Bomb
heroAbilities.description: Sacrifice some of your health to launch a bomb that deals damage after a brief arm time. Self damage type is Spirit and can be mitigated.

powerUp.description: Bombs leave a toxic mess on the ground, dealing 22% of the original damage per second, for 6s.

heroAbilities.name: Life Drain
heroAbilities.description: Create a tether that drains enemy health over time and heals you. Target must be in line of sight and within max range to drain. You can shoot and use other abilities during the drain, but your movement speed is reduced by half. Cant [Alt-Cast] to give life to allies. Press [2] to cancel.

powerUp.description: Ability becomes charged and grants +1 charge.

heroAbilities.name: Malice
heroAbilities.description: Sacrifice some of your health to launch blood shards that apply a stack of malice. Each stack slows the victim and increases the damage they take from you. The slow effect decreases over time.

boxstats.description: Effects Per Stack: 8% Damage Amplification for 9s and 15% Movement Slow for 4s.

powerUp.description: +40 Health To Damage and +7% Damage Amp

heroAbilities.name: Soul Exchange
heroAbilities.description: Swaps health levels with an enemy target. There is a minimum health percentage that enemies can be brought down to and a minimum amount of health recieved based on victims current health.

heroAbilities.name: Ground Strike
heroAbilities.description: Stomp the ground beneath you, damaging enemies in front of you. If you perform Ground Strike while airborne, you quicky dive towards teh ground. Damage grows slower after 25m.

powerUp.description: Struck enemies are popped into the air and slowed for 50% for 3s
Damage Per Meter +110% and improved scaling

heroAbilities.name: Grapple
heroAbilities.description: Pull yourself through the air toward a target. Using Grapple also resets your limit of air jumps and dashes.

powerUp.description: +20m Cast Range and gain +6 Weapon Damage for 10s

heroAbilities.name: Flog
heroAbilities.description: Strike enemies with your whip, stealing life from them.

powerUp.description: +105 Damage and applies 35% Fire Rate Slow

heroAbilities.name: Death Slam
heroAbilities.description: Focus on enemies to connect whips to them. After channeling, connected enemies are lifted and stunned then slammed into the ground. Your victims and any enemies in the landing zone will be damaged and slow. Press [leftClick] to throw connected enemies early. Enemies that are not in line of sight or go out of range during the latch time will not be grabbed.

boxstats.description: 50% Movement Slow, 4s Slow Duration and 0.3s Charge Time

heroAbilities.name: Mini Turret
heroAbilities.description: Deploy a Mini Turret that automatically shoots enemies. The turret expires after a limited lifetime. Turrets gain 30HP per boon. They deal reduced damage to troopers and objectives.

heroAbilities.name: Medicinal Specter
heroAbilities.description: Deploy a spirit that heals nearby units

powerUp.description: +35% Fire Rate on units being healed by Medicinal Specter

heroAbilities.name: Spectral Wall
heroAbilities.description: Creates a wall that divides the terrain in half. On creation, the weall deals damage and applies slow to enemies nearby. After casting, press [LeftClick] or [3] to erupt the wall early.

boxstats.description: 7m Minimum Range, 5m Impact Range and 2.5s Slow Duration

powerUp.description: Removes 1 Stamina and amplifies McGinnis's damage by 15% on hit enemies for 7s
Adds a 0.75s Stun to enemies hit by the Spectral Wall

heroAbilities.name: Heavy Barrage
heroAbilities.description: Unleashes a volley of rockets that home on a targets locations

boxstats.description: 9m Min Range, 13s Channel Duration and -35% Movement Speed

heroAbilities.name: Scorn
heroAbilities.description: Deal damage to nearby enemies and heal yourself based on the damage done. Heal is stronger against enemy heroes.

powerUp.description: Adds a debuff to enemies that lets Mo & Krill deal +15% damage to them. Stacks and lasts 16s.

heroAbilities.name: Burrow
heroAbilities.description: Burrow underground, moving faster, and gaining spirit and bullet armor. Damage from enemy heroes will reduce the speed bonus. When you jump out, know enemies into the air and perform a spin attack that damages and slows. Cooldown starts when burrow ends.

heroAbilities.name: Sand Blast
heroAbilities.description: Spray sand that disarms enemies in front of you and deals damage

heroAbilities.name: Combo
heroAbilities.description: Hold the target in place, stunning them and dealing damage during the channel. If they die during Combo or within 3s after it ends, you permanently gain max health.

heroAbilities.name: Pulse Grenade
heroAbilities.description: Throw a grenade that begins pulsing when it lands. Each pulse applies damage, movement slow, and stacking damage amplification for Paradox against the victim.

boxstats.description: 0.8s Pulse Interval, 8s Amp Duration, 30% Movement Slow and 2s Slow Duration

powerUp.description: +45 Pulse Damage and +0.8m Radius per Pulse

heroAbilities.name: Time Wall
heroAbilities.description: Create a time warping wall that stops time for all enemy projectiles and bullets that touch it. Enemies that touch the wall will take damage as a percentage of their max health and be briefly slowed.

powerUp.description: Enemies that touch Time Wall will be Silenced for 2.5s

heroAbilities.name: Kinetic Carbine
heroAbilities.description: Start charging your weapon and gain increased movement speed once it's fully charged. Your next shot will release the energy, dealing spirit damage and applying time stop to the enemy hit. The damage dealt is an amplification of your current weapon damage. You can slow time on yourself by pressing [rightclick] while an empowered shot is avaiable.

boxstats.description: 5 Bullet Damage, +25% Min Damage Amp, 2.5s Full Charge Time, 0.25s Min Stop Duration, 3.5s Speed Duration

heroAbilities.name: Paradoxical Swap
heroAbilities.description: Fire a projectile that swaps your position with the target enemy hero. While the effect occurs, you gain spirit lifesteal and the enemy takes damage over time.

heroAbilities.name: Barrage
heroAbilities.description: Channel to start launching projectiles that deal damage and apply movememnt slow around their impact point. Each projectile landed on a hero grants a tacking buff that amplifies all your damage. If you cast it while in the air, you'll float and maintain any horizontal momentum you started with.

boxstats.description: 4 Projectiles, 1.5s Slow Duration and 15s Amp Duration

heroAbilities.name: Flying Cloak
heroAbilities.description: Launch a sentient cloak that travels forward and damages enemies. You can press [2] to teleport to its location.

powerUp.description: +7 Weapon Damage for 10s after teleporting with Flying Cloak.

heroAbilities.name: Enchanter's Satchel
heroAbilities.description: Escape into your suitcase. When the duration ends, deal damage to nearby enemies. Duration can be ended early by performing any action.

powerUp.description: Applies 40% Fire Rate Slow for 4s and +0.5 Escape Duration

heroAbilities.name: Affliction
heroAbilities.description: Deals % Current Health damage, and then applies damage over time to all enemies near by. Affliction's damage is non-lethal and does not apply item procs.

powerUp.description: Suppress target's healing by -40% and +4s duration

heroAbilities.name: Lightning Ball
heroAbilities.description: Shoot a ball of lightning that travels in a straight line. Does damage to all targets in its radius. Slows down when damaging enemies ands tops if it hits the world.

heroAbilities.name: Static Charge
heroAbilities.description: Apply a charge to a target enemy hero. After a short duration, the static charge stuns and damages enemies within radius.

heroAbilities.name: Power Surge
heroAbilities.description: Power up your weapon with shock effect, making your bullets proc shock damage on your target. This shock damage bounces to enemies near your target. Occurs once per burst shot.

powerUp.description: Shock Damage applies -15% Spirit Resist for 8s
+12 Shock Damage, Improved Spirit Scaling, and +3 Max Jumps.

heroAbilities.name: Storm Cloud
heroAbilities.description: Channel an expanding storm cloud around you that damages all enemies within its radius. Enemies do not take  damage when they are out of line of sight.You have increased Bullet Resist during the channel. While channeling, press Left Click to mark the targeted area to be struck with a powerful lightning bolt that knocks enemies away after a 0.25s delay. One use per cast.

powerUp.description: +35% Bullet Resist While channeling Storm Cloud

heroAbilities.name: Serrated Knives
heroAbilities.description:
Throw a knife that damages and slows an enemy. Each additional hit adds a stack and rereshes the debuff duration, causing the damage to increase per stack.
 Ultimate Unlock: While Rage is full, knives will ricochet to another enemy and apply Movement Slow to enemies they bleed.

boxstats.description: 35% Movement Slow when Rage is full

heroAbilities.name: Slice and Dice
heroAbilities.description:
Perform a dash forward, damaging enemies along hte path.
 Ultimate Unlock: While Rage is full an echo of Shiv retraces the dash path after a short delay, damaging enemies again.

powerUp.description: Reduce cooldown by 2s per enemy hit ( 1s for Non-Heros). Max -6s per Dash.

heroAbilities.name: Bloodletting
heroAbilities.description:
Take only a portion of incoming damage immediately and defer the rest to be taken over time. Activate to clear a portion of the defered damage.
 Ultimate Unlock: While Rage is full, the amount of damage defered is increased.

boxstats.description: +14% Incoming Damage Deffered while Rage is full

heroAbilities.name: Killing Blow
heroAbilities.description:
Activate to leap towards an enemy hero and instantly kill them if their health is below the threshold, otherwise dealing 200 damage to them.
 Passive: Damaging enemies fills you with rage. While at full rage, Shive gais increased damage and special properties on his other abilities.

powerUp.description: Gain +2 m/s Movement Speed while at full Rage
+5% Enemey Health Threshold and +8% Full Rage Bonus Damage
Finishing off an enemy with Killing Blow resets its cooldown.

heroAbilities.name: Splatter
heroAbilities.description: Throw a ball of goo that deals damage and leaves puddles of goo behind that apply movement slow to enemies in the radius that walk on them.

heroAbilities.name: The Cube
heroAbilities.description: Encase the target in a cube of restorative goo that protects from damage and icreases health regen. Target is unable to take any new actions while cubed. Can be used on self. Press [space] to escape early.

powerUp.description: Increases Movement Speed and Stamina Recovery

heroAbilities.name: Puddle Punch
heroAbilities.description: Materialize a fist in the world that punches unites in the area and sends them flying. Enemies will be dealt damage, have their dash distance reduced for a brief moment, and have their movement slowed. This is considered a Light Melee attack.

powerUp.description: -11.5s Cooldown and now deals Heavy Melee Damage

heroAbilities.name: Goo Ball
heroAbilities.description: Morph into a large goo ball that deals damage and stuns enemies on impact. The ball grants large amounts of Bullet and Spirit Resist, boucnes off walls and can double jump.

powerUp.description: Can Cast abilities and use items while rolling

heroAbilities.name: Alchemical Flask
heroAbilities.description: Throw a flask that damages, slows, and reduces the weapon damage and stamina of enemies it hits.

boxstats.description: 3s Slow Duration and 7s Weapon Debuff Duration

powerUp.description: -7s Cooldown and applies 35% Fire Rate Slow

heroAbilities.name: Willpower
heroAbilities.description: Gain a spirt shield and bonus movement speed.

powerUp.description: +200 Spirit Shield Health and now scales with Spirit Power

heroAbilities.name: Binding Word
heroAbilities.description: Curse an enemy hero. If they don't move away from their initial position within the escape time, they will be damamged and immobilized.

powerUp.description: Warden deals +20% more Bullet Damage to trapped Heroes for 6s

heroAbilities.name: Last Stand
heroAbilities.description: After charging for 2s, release pulses that damage enemies and heal you based on the damage done. While channeling last stand, you recieve greatly increased bullet and spirit resist. Goes on a reduced cooldown if interupted while charging.

boxstats.description: 0.5s Pulse Interval, 20% Non-Hero Lifesteal, 30% Bullet Resist and Spirit Resist

powerUp.description: +50% Bullet and Spirit Resistance During Channel and +2.5s Duration

heroAbilities.name: Card Trick
heroAbilities.description: Deal weapon damage to summon cards. Activate to throw a card that flies towards the enemy or point under your crosshair.

heroAbilities.name: Project Mind
heroAbilities.description: Teleport to the targeted location

powerUp.description: Provides a 300 bullet shield for 8s on teleport. Shield amount scales with Spirit Power.

heroAbilities.name: Full Auto
heroAbilities.description: Temporarily boosts your fire rate. Nearby allies receive half the fire rate bonus.

powerUp.description: +20% Bullet and Spirit LifeSteal and Spirit Damage per Bullet now scales with Spirit

heroAbilities.name: Telekinesis
heroAbilities.description: Lift an enemy hero into the air, stunning them, then slam them to the ground. Targets are silenced and disarmed afterwards.

powerUp.description: Telekinesis will bounce to an additional naerby target

heroAbilities.name: Tornado
heroAbilities.description: Transform yourself into a tornado that travels forward damaging enemies and lifting them up in the air. After emerging from the tornado you gain bullet evasion.

heroAbilities.name: Fire Scarabs
heroAbilities.description: Start launching fire scarabs. Each scarab can be launched seperately, stealing max health from enemies over time and applying bullet resist reduction. Applying multiple scarabs to the same enemy will extend the health stealing duration. The health gain from hitting heroes is 3x as effective against non-heroes.

boxstats.description: 8s Launch Window, 14s Debuff Duration and 4s Steal Health Duration

heroAbilities.name: Djinn's Mark
heroAbilities.description:
Passive: Your shots apply an increasing multuplier on the target. When the multiplier on a target expires or your reach the max, it is consumed and the target suffers Spirit Damage and is briefly revealed on the map. The final damage is the base damage times the multiplier.
Active: Consume multiplier of Djinn's Mark to deal its damage now.

powerUp.description: Apply 60% Slow for 0.5s whenever you apply 2x multiplier or higher
-0.8s Cooldown Between Multiplier and +4 Max Multipler

heroAbilities.name: Traveler
heroAbilities.description: Channeled. Target an ally or visible enemy hero on the minimap, then teleport to where they where when your channel started. After teleporting, you gain movement speed as well as fire rate until your next reload.

powerUp.description: On arrival, become immune to Silence, Stun, Sleep, Root and Disarm for 3s

heroAbilities.name: Gloom Bombs
heroAbilities.description: Throw a clust of bombs that detonate after a delay, dealing spirit damage. Enemies hit by multiple bombs take 50% damage.

heroAbilities.name: Leaping Slash
heroAbilities.description: Dash forward before slashing all enemies in a circle dealing light melee damage. If the ability hits at least one champion, heal a small amount of health.

heroAbilities.name: Ava
heroAbilities.description: Turn to shadowns and posses Ava. You gain Movement Speend and become Hidden on the minimap but cannot attack or use abilities. Cannot be used 5 seconds after taking damage from an enemy hero.

powerUp.description: -15s Cooldown and Gain 30 Health Regen During Ava

heroAbilities.name: Return to Shadows
heroAbilities.description: Instantly turn to shadows, becoming untargetable, gaining movement speed, and dealing spirit damage. After 3s, return from the shadows dealing spirit damage.

powerUp.description: Reset all your Cooldowns and gaind 30% Damage Amp for 5s

heroAbilities.name: Powder Keg
heroAbilities.description: Throw an explosive barrel that arms after a delay. Once armed, the barrel can be shot, meleed, launched, or detonated by another barrel to explode, dealing spirit damage.

heroAbilities.name: Bounce Pad
heroAbilities.description: Drop a bounce pad in the world that launches any hero. You explode on landing, dealing Spirit Damage to any nearby enemies. The explosion can only occur once per Boucne Pad.

powerUp.description: You and allies gain a +4m/s move speed bonus for 4s on landing

heroAbilities.name: Crackshot
heroAbilities.description: Headshots deal bonus Damage and applies a Fasing Slow. This effect can only occur when off cooldown. Crackshot is reduced by 50% on NPCs

powerUp.description: -4s Cooldown Per headshot on Heros and 2s on NPCs

heroAbilities.name: Spirit Lasso
heroAbilities.description: Throw out your lasso, dealing spirit damage and grabbing the first enemy hit. Grabbed enemies are stunned and dragged along behind you. While Spirit Lasso is active, Holliday cannot melee or shoot. Using a Bounce Pad increases the duration by 1s.

heroAbilities.name: Vexing Bolt
heroAbilities.description: Fire a bolt of magic that deals spirit damage, increasing with distance traveled . If you have an assistant, they also cast Vexing Bolt at a reduced damage. Press 1 to redirect the bolt towards your crosshairs.

heroAbilities.name: Spectral Assistant
heroAbilities.description: Summon an Assistant at the target location. The Assistant attacks whenever you fire a weapon, dealing Spirit Damage. While Assistant is out, you can press 2 to swap positions with your Assistant. Casting Spectral Assistant also reloads your weapon.

heroAbilities.name: Rabbit Hex
heroAbilities.description: Hex a target area, dealing spirit damage and transforming all enemies into a Rabbit for a limited duration. Rabbits are small and move faster, but they take increased damage and are unable to perform most actions.

heroAbilities.name: Audience Participation
heroAbilities.description: Copy the Ultiamte of an enemy for a limited. Reactivating the ability will use the Stolen Ultimate instad.

heroAbilities.name: Screwjab Dagger
heroAbilities.description: Throw a dagger, dealing Spirit Damage and applying a Fading Slow.

heroAbilities.name: Lethal Venom
heroAbilities.description: Inject a target with lethal venom. After a delay the venom triggers, dealing Spirit Damage. The damage is increased by the target's missing health.

boxstats.description: 25% Health for Max Damage and 3s for Venom Buildup

powerUp.description: Bullets also build up Lethal Venom

heroAbilities.name: Slither
heroAbilities.description: You have increased Slide Distance, can Slide up hills and can turn faster while Sliding.

powerUp.description: +25% Spirit and Bullet Resist while Sliding

heroAbilities.name: Petrifying Bola
heroAbilities.description: Throw an explosive bola. On exploding the bola slows and deals spirit damage to all enemies in the area. Direct hits deal additional spirit damage and Petrify instead.Petrified units block all damage but cannot take actions.

boxstats.description: 200 Petrify Block Damage, 50% Movement Slow and 1.5s Slow Duration

powerUp.description: +1s Petrify Duration. Petrifies all enemies in the area.

passive.description: Deal additional Weapon Damage when in close range to your target
Deal bonus Weapon Damage with headshots
When you are above 65% health, deal additional Weapon Damage and your bullets reduce enemy Bullet Resist.
Your next bullet will heal you based on what target you hit. Soul Orbs count as NPcs
While reloading, pressing [R] during the highlighed portion will instantly finish your reload and grant you Fire Rate and Bullet Lifesteal

Attacking enemies from behind with your weapon or melee opens a wound dealing spirit damage over time and reducing their bullet resist. During this time, if you or any allies are near the target, will see them through walls and be given bonus move speed.
Your Weapon Damage increases as you take sustained damage
Your next Dash-Jump does not cost an extra stamina you will gain Fire Rate and bonus Ammo until your next reload.
Deal additional Weapon Damage when beyond minimum distance from your target.

Your next heavy melee attack against an enemy deals increased damage and either reloads your weapon instantly or gives you up to +100% Bonus Ammo.
Only activates when Bonus Ammo is not full.
Your next bullet deals bonus Spirit Damage.
Your attacks have additional Weapon Damage against enemies above 50% health.
Your bullets build up a Movement Slow on the enemies
Your bullets apply a debuff that reduces the Spirit Resist of the target and grants you Spirit Lifesteal against them.

active.description:
Make your weapon fire multishot.
Hitting more than one Hero per attack will grant a stacking weapon damage bonus.
Targets can only be hit once per multishot.

passive.description: Removes the Movement Speed penalty while shooting

active.description: Gain bonus Movement Speed and Ammo

passive.description: Briefly gain Fire Rate and Move Speed when one of your bullets hits an enemy hero.
Grants Bullet Resist when your bullets hit an enemy hero. Each shot can only grant one stack.
After not attacking for 4s, your next attack will fire twice in quick succession with increased damage and velocity. This attack consumes extra ammo.
Landing a headshot deals bonus damage, heals you for a portion of your Max HP, and briefly grants you bonus move speed.
Reduces nearby enemies' Bullet Resist and Fire Rate. If there is only one enemy hero, this effect is trippled.
Increases Weapon Damage as you continously fire your weapon.
Upon landing a headshot reduce target's Bullet Resist.
When in close range to your target, gain Weapon Damage and your bullets apply a Movement Slow.
Deal additional Weapon Damage when beyond minimum distance from your target.

Your bullets apply a debuff that reduces the Spirit Resist of the target and grants you and your allies Spirit Lifesteal against them.Landing headshots against the target reduces their Spirit Resist further.
Your bullets have a chance to shock your target. The shock will jump to a nearby enemy.
Your bullets build up a Bleed on enemies causing them to lose a percentage of their max health over time. Also applies Healing Reduction on the bleeding target
Your Bullets have a chance to become unavoidable, piercing through enemies and ignoring their Bullet Resistance.
Your bullets have a chance to shock your target. The shock will jump to a nearby enemy.

active.description: Launch a projectile that deals damage, removes all their non-ultimate buffs and applies a strong slow that recovers over time.
Throw a flash that explodes on contact, creating an area that does increasing Spirit Damage per second and reduces enemy Bullet Resist

Toggle: Continually sacrifice Health to improve fire rate, Debuff Resistance and Move Speed.
Healing received is reduced during the sacrifice.
Target an enemy NPC and consume it for 150% Bonus Souls and grants a powerful long lasting buff.

passive.description: Provides Bullet Resist to nearby friendly units.

active.description: Provides bonus Movement Speed and Fire Rate to you and nearby allies. Minons get double value.
Teleport straight ahead, gaining Bullet Resist

passive.description: Headshots reduce target's Bullet and Spirit Resist. Also applies healing reduction on the target.

Your next Heavy Melee attack against an enemy deals increased damage. Your melee damage will restore ammo and apply a stacking bullet resist debuff on enemies. Heavy melee applies 2 stacks.
If the target reaches max stacks, they will be stunned.

Your melee damage will restore ammo and apply a stacking bullet resist debuff on enemies. Heavy melee applies 2 stacks.
If the target reaches max stacks, they will be stunned.
When you are below 50% health, you gain stat bonuses
Each hero kill grants permanent WeFire Rate (up to a max of 8 times). Death results in the loss of 1 stack
Your bullets have a chance to be empowered, causing them to  deal bonus damage.
Your bullets will ricochet on enemies near your target, applying any bullet procs and dealing percentage of the original damage.
Your bullets temporarily steal Max HP from enemies. Enemies regain their stolen health when the debuff expires. Permanently steal one stack of health if a siphoned target dies lost two if you die.
Gain bonus Spirit Power by charging up with your bullets on enemy heroes.
Your bullets reduce enemy Spirit Damage and build up a Debuff that briefly Silences enemies. Victims are immune to the build up for 10s after the debuff expires

active.description: Grants Lifesteal, Fire Rate, and Ammo. This added Ammo is notlimited by your max magazine size

passive.description: Taking heavy hits of spirit damage from an enemy reduces a random ability cooldown.
Whenever you cast an ability or item, gain a stacking buff that improves Fire Rate and Reload Speed.
Your Melee attacks heal you. This heal is 30% effective vs non-heroes.
On a successful Parry against an enemy Hero, Heal yourself for the damage parried and returns that damage to the target, and temporarily gain increased melee damage.

active.description: Grant Regen and Sprint Speed to the target. Gets dispelled if you take any damage from enemy players or objectives. Can be self-cast.

passive.description: While you are above 65% health, gain weapon damage and bonus fire rate.
Reduces the duration of all negative effects applied to you.
While you are above 65% health, gain bonus Spirit and Cooldown Reduction.
Reduces the effect of enemy Movement Slow

active.description:
Provide the target with a Barrier and temporary Move Speed.
Can be self-cast.
Cooldown is reduced by half when cast on someone else.

passive.description: Your Spirt Damage applies Healing Reduction. If an enemy hero dies under this effect, you recieve a large heal.
Increases the effectiveness of your Healing by 25% and resistance to Healing reduction by 15%
Automatically restores 1 stamina and gain a temporary Barrier when you are movement locked, Stunned, Chained, Immobilized, or Slept.
Gain a Barrier whenever you take significant spirit damage from enemy Heroes in a small time frame.
Gain a Barrier whenever you take significant weapon damage from enemy Heroes in a small time frame.

active.description: Remove all Non-Stun Debuffs from the target and provide them with a Barrier and Movement Speed. Can be self-cast. Cooldown is reduced by half when cast on someone else.

passive.description: When below 30% health, gain additional Bullet Resist.
Your next parry protects you from the damage and effects of enemy abilities and items. On a successful spell parry gain Move Speed and Spirit Power.

active.description: Heal yourself and nearby allies. Heals an additional 20% per ally

passive.description: When an enemy uses an ability within 35m range from you, store one Restoration Stack.

active.description: Consume all stacks to heal target ally and replenish a stamina point for the target as well. Can be self-cast.
Automatically fire a bullet towards any attacker who damages you with their abilities or weapon.

passive.description: After not taking damage for 12s, gain 3% Max Health Regen
When you are above 75% health, you have bonus Weapon Damage and Movement Speed.

active.description: Grants Fire Rate and Bullet Resistance but Silences you and disables stamina usage and regeneration.

passive.description: Your Melee Attack applies Movement Slow and heals you for 60% of Melee Damage dealt plus 160. This heal is 40% effective vs non-heroes.
Increase the number of Air Dashes, Air Jumps and Wall Jumps that can be performed before landing from 1 to 2.
Whenever you score an assist or kill, gain extra health, sprint, ability range and passive soul generation. This effect stacks and persists through death.
Walking through a cosmic veil grants you Stealth, Heals, and increase Movement Speed.

active.description: Purge all the negative effects currently applied to you. If any effects were removed, gain a movement speed bonus and heal yourself. Cannot be used while Stunned or Slept.
Launch yourself high into the air. While in the air, you can use the active again to drop down faster. Cannot be used for 5s if attacked by an enemy hero.
Become immune to bullets
Heals a target allied hero and yourself for a percentage of Max Health. Once while healing you can Pull the target towards you. Can be self cast.

passive.description: When below 30% health, gain additional Spirit Resist.
Your bullets reduce the target's outgoing damage and apply healing reduction.
Enemies that shoot you have their Fire Rate slowed.

When you would take lethal damage, instead become temporarily death immune.
While death immune, you deal reduced damage, have reduced healing and move slower.

Applying heal to yourself or an ally grants the target bonus fire rate and bonus move speed.
Does not apply on innate Regen or innate Bullet/Spirit Lifesteal.

active.description: Gain Bullet and Spirit Resist, and slow the movement and dash speed of enemies nearby. Your model size grows by 20%
Teleport to an enemy target and pull them to the ground applying Disarm, Slow, and dealing damage.

passive.description: Gain a chance to either deflect incoming bullets, preventing all weapon damage or prevent all on-hit effects from bullets.
The next instance of high spirit damage you take is significantly reduced.

active.description: Become Stealthed. Whenever you take damage while Stealthed, you get briefly revealed
Attacking or using an abilty will end your stealth and start an ambush, temporarily granting you bonus Fire Rate and Spirit Power
Suppress negative status effects and become Immune to Stun, Silence, Sleep, Root, and Disarm.

passive.description: Abilities deal bonus Spirit Damage if they deal 80 damage or more in a single hit
Dealing Spirit Damage to enemy Heroes grants you Bonus Health Regen. Stacks when dealing damage to different heroes.

active.description: Target an enemy to reduce their Fire Rate.

passive.description: When you perform a Light or Heavy Melee attack against a hero, deal extra Spirit Damage with the attack and reduce the target's Spirit Resist

active.description: Gain Spirit Power and Spirit Lifesteal

passive.description: Reduces Bullet Resist on enemies when you deal Spirit Damage
Imbue an ability to increase its Duration.
Imbue an ability to reduce its Cooldown.
When the target takes Spirit Damage, they have their Spirit Resist reduced.
Your Imbued Ability charges up over time with bonus Spirit Damage, Bonus Fire Rate and Bonus Bullets on use
When you deal Spirit Damage to enemies, you also apply Fire Rate Slow.

active.description: Release an expanding ice blast that deals Spirit Damage and Slows the target it hits.
Reduces healing received of targeted enemy and inflicts damage over time of their current health. Decay's damage is non-lethal
Deals Spirit Damage and Slows targets movement and dashes. Also Silences their movement-based items and abilities. Does not affect target's stamina usage.
Target an enemy to reduce their Spirit Resist and Spirit Power.
Disarms enemy target and reduces their Bullet Resist.

passive.description: Abilities deal bonus Spirit Damage if they deal 165 damage or more in a single hit.
Increase the range and effect radius of your abilities and items.
When the target takes Spirit Damage, they have their Movement Speed reduced.

active.description:
Launch an expanding projectile which Silences enemies for a short duration. Affected enemies also have their Spirit Resist and Spirit Power reduced for a longer duration.
Silence does not interrupt channeling abilities.

passive.description: Reduces the cooldown of your abilities and items
Increase the duration of your abilities and items.
Imbue an ability with permanent Spirit Power. When that ability is used, gain bonus Movement Speed and maintain full speed while attacking.
Periodically deals Spirit Damage to the closest two enemies nearby.

active.description: Release an expanding ice blast that deals Spirit Damage, Freezing and then Slowing targets it hits. Targets take increased damage while frozen.

You enter a void state and become untargetable and invincible for a short duration, during which you float slowly and cannot perform any actions. Afterwards you gain bonus movement speed and spirit resist. Can be canceled early.
Target an enemy to silence them. A portion of all damage dealt during the silence gets applied to the target when the silence wears off.

passive.description:
Damage from your ultimate applies a stun and deals bonus spirit damage after a short delay.
This effect can only trigger once per target per ultimate, and cannot activate on ultimates with charges.

active.description: Target is knocked down and Stunned after a 2s delay, interuppting and temporarily preventing them from taking any action. Stun lasts up to 2x longer if cast on airborne targets based on how high off the ground they are (up to 30m).

passive.description: Heal and gain a bonus Movement Speed every time you cast an ability.
Upon casting an ultimate ability gain temporary Barrier, and temporary Spirit Power.

active.description: Dealing Spirit Damage applies a stacking Spirit Amp that increases your Spirit Damage to the target.

passive.description: Imbue an ability to apply a slow on the target and deal an additional percentage of the damage dealt to enemies around the target after a short delay.

active.description: Curses an enemey - Interrupting, Silencing, Disarming, and preventing item usage.
Reset the cooldown of the imbued non-ultimate ability
Summon a Magic Carpet that will fly you away Cannot use abilities while the carpet is being summoned. While flying you are Immune to Slows and doing any action will dismiss the carpet

passive.description: Your imbued ability charges up over time with bonus spirit damage, bonus fire rate, and bonus bullets on use. Until your next reload, your bullets deal bonus Spirit Damage based on your Spirit Power.

active.description: Reset the cooldown of all your abilities and restore all your charges

Apply Spirit Resistance and an aura on a friendly target that deals damage to enemies proportional to their max health.
Can be self cast.

passive.description:
Dealing significant Spirit Damage to an enemy within 5s causes an explosion dealing damage and a burn to nearby enemies. While burning, enemies take damage over time and receive reduced healing.
Deals half damage to non-heroes and does not expend its cooldown unless a hero is hit.

active.description: Throw a vacuum grenade, pulling all enemies into a small area and applying Slowing Hex.

passive.description: After a successful Dash Jump, the next abilty you use will also have increased Range, Duration and Spirit Power. Additionally you gain Fire Rate and Bonus Ammo till your next Reload. Lasts up to 7s
When you perform a Light or Heavy Melee Attack against a hero, the attack deals extra Spirit Damage and steals Spirit Resist and Spirit Power
